price: (وايي) موږ يوازې د الله د مخ لپاره خواړه دركوو، نه له تاسې بدله غواړو او نه مننه (تشکري)
arabic: إِنَّمَا نُطۡعِمُكُمۡ لِوَجۡهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَلَا شُكُورًا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: innamā nuṭ'ʿimukum liwajhi al-lahi lā nurīdu minkum jazāan walā shukūran
